#summary Installation instructions for beta testers installed pre-release versions of Dark Nova.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

For first time testers, you must first download the "Provisioing Profile" then install the game.


= Instructions =

  # Download the provisioning profile from the downloads section here http://code.google.com/p/darknova-iphone/downloads/list
  # Download a Dark Nova pre-release version from the downloads section.
  # Launch Itunes
  # Drop the provisioning profile on to the iTunes window
  # Drop the .ipa file (Dark Nova) on to the iTunes window
  # Sync your device.
